backend/main.mo: Actor combining blob storage, access control, and user-approval logic, providing approval workflows and user profile CRUD with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report linking a deployment retry requirement to related files, components, and test metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used for build or documentation reference.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook describing how to re-trigger a build/deploy without code changes and troubleshoot transient deployment failures.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining theme variables, light/dark modes, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with a root div and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling session initialization, login, admin panel, and user dashboard routing inside theme and session providers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable action tile component with size variants, gradients, icons, and mobile‑optimized layout.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/dashbo: Shared Tailwind class constants for consistent dashboard borders, padding, and container styling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: Configurable confirmation dialog using alert‑dialog components with customizable actions and variants.
Toast-based notification helper providing success, error, and info message utilities.
App layout wrapper with header, footer, logout flow, and confirmation dialog integration.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomShe: Modal bottom-sheet component with backdrop, slide-up animation, scroll lock, and close controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Renders a footer with optional settings button and a support/chat button using Tailwind and Lucide icons.
Provides a centered fixed-size dashboard container with a styled background.
frontend/src/components/layout/PopupModa: Implements a full-screen modal with backdrop, scrollable content, and a close button while disabling body scroll.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Controls the admin panel views, header, footer, navigation logic, and logout flow within a dashboard frame.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Displays a fixed bottom navigation bar for switching between admin views.
Shows a 3-row grid of action tiles for navigating to different admin sections with customizable labels.
Provides a page shell with fixed header, scrollable content area, and footer for admin subpages.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines the AdminView type and navigation item metadata for admin sections.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Loads account data from storage and displays KPI cards for due, total income, and total expenses.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Manages pending user approvals, allowing admins to approve or reject registrations and update stored user/account data.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Manages adding and listing company taken/due reports using local storage with form inputs and tables.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Displays final balance per worker by loading stored worker and account data and calculating remaining balances.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Handles snack expense entries for selected workers, updates cost accounts, and manages history with delete support.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Records loan/payment entries for workers, updates account costs, and manages entry history with deletion.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Adds production work entries, updates worker bill totals, and displays sortable production history with delete options.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Wrapper that renders the system settings section.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Provides tabs for branding, labels, notices, and section settings, including logo upload and various config editors.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Renders the approvals section for handling user requests.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Provides UI to add workers and manage their single/double rates, persisting updates to local storage.
Manages worker work entries, saving counts, calculating amounts, and updating history and accounts in local storage.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Handles user login with branding display, form validation, and session authentication.
Processes user registration requests, checks duplicates, assigns IDs, and stores pending requests.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Displays support threads and messaging, allowing users or admins to send and view messages via stored threads.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: A live clock component showing current time and date.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Displays user's total due, work, and taken amounts using styled KPI cards.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Nasta: Loads and displays user's nasta history with per-entry and total calculations.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Shows loan/payment records relevant to the user with calculated per-user amounts.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Displays production records for the user including totals for body count and earnings.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Utility to format worker names from entries, falling back to 'Unknown worker'.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: User profile settings page allowing photo upload, mobile changes, and password updates.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Main user dashboard managing view modes, loading user totals, and routing to history or profile views.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Displays a user's filtered work history from local storage and calculates per-entry and total earnings.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Provides helpers to compute per-user and group work amounts using details or fallback rate data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Loads and updates branding settings from local storage and listens for branding update events.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardOverrides: Retrieves dashboard label overrides and updates state when override events are dispatched.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Manages simple hash-based routing with automatic updates on hash changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, and logout via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserNotice.ts: Loads the scrolling notice configuration and updates when notice config events occur.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, gradients, utilities, and animations for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Stores and retrieves branding settings in local storage and dispatches events on updates.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Manages CRUD operations for company report entries stored in local storage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/dashboardOverri: Handles loading, saving, and resetting dashboard override labels in local storage with event dispatching.
frontend/src/lib/storage/noticeStorage.t: Manages saving and loading the user notice configuration with event updates.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers for localStorage get/set/remove operations and utilities for handling arrays.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Handles one-time migration by clearing legacy storage keys and setting a storage schema version.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Manages support message threads in localStorage, including retrieving, updating, and adding messages.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userIdStorage.t: Assigns and maintains stable numeric user IDs for approved users and retrieves IDs by name or mobile.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Stores, retrieves, and removes base64 profile photos in localStorage using a username-based key.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Implements session state, login/logout, profile updates, and restores sessions while ensuring user IDs.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for session objects, user data, and related session operations.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Custom hook that provides access to the session context.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, versions, issues, and features.
